text: The 2006 Girls' Youth NORCECA Volleyball Championship was played from July 23 to July 31, 2006 in Gainesville, Florida, United States. Six teams competed in this tournament. United States won the tournament for the fourth time defeating Dominican Republic. Puerto Rico joined the United States and Dominican Republic to compete at the 2007 Girls' U18 World Championship.
